pkutils.options.car.general.fast_find.to: Finds your car immediately when execution '/car find'
pkutils.options.car.general.fast_lock.to: Locks the car immediately when execution '/car lock'
pkutils.options.car.general.highlight.to: Highlights your car when you exit it
pkutils.options.car.automation.lock.name: Automated locking
pkutils.options.car.automation.lock.tool: Locks the car automatically when you start the engine
pkutils.options.car.automation.start.too: Starts the car automatically when you enter it
pkutils.options.nametag.faction.informat: Shows faction information in the nametag
pkutils.options.notification_sounds.name: Notification sounds
pkutils.options.notification_sounds.tool: Play custom sounds for some notifications
pkutils.options.reinforcement_style.name: Reinforcement style
pkutils.options.atm_information.name: ATM information
pkutils.options.atm_information.value.no: Do not show additional bank information
pkutils.options.atm_information.value.bo: Shows both your faction and group bank balances
pkutils.options.widgets.car_locked.optio: Shows whether your car is locked or unlocked
pkutils.options.widgets.date_time.option: Shows the current date and time
pkutils.options.widgets.hearth.options.t: Shows the hearth amount and the absorption state
pkutils.options.widgets.money.options.to: Shows your current money on the hand and in the bank
pkutils.options.widgets.payday.options.t: Shows information about the next PayDay
pkutils.options.widgets.payday.options.s: Shows predicted PayDay salary from part time jobs
pkutils.options.widgets.payday.options.e: Shows experience gained since last PayDay
pkutils.options.widgets.service_count.op: Shows the number of active services
pkutils.screen.data_usage_confirmation.m: PKUtils sends and receives data from an external server and uses the Minecraft session token for authentication. This is required for certain features to function properly. By clicking Agree, you agree to this data usage.
